contents.rollMessage:
Initiative Roll

${#dice1:= ref('dex_current')}$ ${#dice2:= ref('ins_current')}$

DEX = 1d${!dice1}$ = ${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$

INS = 1d${!dice2}$ = ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$

Result: ${!D1}$ + ${!D2}$ + ${total_init}$= ${D1+D2+total_init}$

${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('

CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity

'): string('')}$ ${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('

FUMBLE

'): string('')}$

contents.tooltip: Dexterity: measures precision, coordination, finesse, reflexes. Affects DEF.
Insight: observation, understanding, reasoning. Affects MDEF.
Might: strength, fortitude. Affects max HP.
Willpower: determination, charisma, discipline. Affects max MP.
Temporarily reduces your Dexterity die size by one.
contents.label: Slow

contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Insight die size by one.
contents.label: Dazed

contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Might die size by one.
contents.label: Weak

contents.cssClass: Temporarily reduces your Willpower die size by one.
contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Willpower die size by one.
contents.label: Shaken

contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Dexterity and Insight die sizes by one.
contents.label: Enraged

contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Might and Willpower die sizes by one.
contents.label: Poisoned

contents.rollMessage:
Rolling a ${!rolled_atr1}$ + ${!rolled_atr2}$ Check

${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(rolled_atr1) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(rolled_atr2) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$

${!string(rolled_atr1)}$ = 1d${!dice1}$ = ${D1:=[1d:dice1:]}$

${!string(rolled_atr2)}$ = 1d${!dice2}$ = ${D2:=[1d:dice2:]}$

Result: ${D1+D2}$ HR: ${max(D1, D2)}$

${! largerEq(D1, 6) and D1 == D2 ? string('

CRITICAL SUCCESS! Gain an Opportunity

'): string('')}$ ${!D1 == D2 and D1 == 1 ? string('

FUMBLE

'): string('')}$

contents.tooltip: Temporarily reduces your Willpower die size by one.
Temporarily reduces your Insight die size by one.
Temporarily reduces your Might die size by one.
Temporarily reduces your Might and Willpower die sizes by one.
Temporarily reduces your Dexterity and Insight die sizes by one.
Physical
Fire
Ice
Earth
Air
Bolt
Light
Dark
Poison
【WLP + WLP】 Produce a magical effect based on the Arcana you have bound.
contents.label: Arcanism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 or 【MIG + WLP】 Enhance your senses, see through the eyes of an animal, quell the fury of a monster.
contents.label: Chimerism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Walk on water, shape rock, snuff out fires, cause a rainstorm or summon powerful cyclones.
contents.label: Elementalism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Cause the decay of physical matter, twist the flow of time, teleport creatures or items.
contents.label: Entropism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Extract magic from an object, activate a soul circuit, sense the presence of magic.
contents.label: Ritualism

contents.tooltip: 【INS + WLP】 Sense the presence and feelings of creatures, put someone to sleep or embolden their heart.
contents.label: Spiritism

rowLayout.rollMessage:
${#word:='fa-star-of-david'}$

Casts ${!string(sameRow('spell_name'))}$!

${!string(sameRow('description'))}$

${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_1')) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_1')) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_1')) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice1:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_1')) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice1) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice1}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_2')) ,'DEX') == true ? ref('dex_current') : 0}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_2')) ,'INS') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('ins_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_2')) ,'MIG') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('mig_current') : dice2}$ ${#dice2:= equalText(string(sameRow('main_attrib_2')) ,'WLP') == true and isZero(dice2) == true ? ref('wlp_current') : dice2}$

${#HR:=max(D1, D2)}$

Spell Attack Roll: ${D1+D2+sameRow('magic_chk_bonus')+ref('skillmag_mod')}$ HR: ${HR}$

${#element:= ''}$ ${#element_bg:= ''}$ ${#element_icon:= ''}$ ${#element:=equalText(string(sameRow('spell1_damagetype')) ,'ICE') == true ?'#16E9DE':element}$ ${#element_icon:=equalText(string(sameRow('spell1_damagetype')) ,'LIG') == true ?'fa-sun':element_icon}$ ${#element:=equalText(string(sameRow('spell1_damagetype')) ,'DAR') == true ?'#000000':element}$ ?'fa-moon-stars':element_icon}$ ${#element:=equalText(string(sameRow('spell1_damagetype')) ,'POI') == true ?'#FF00F5':element}$ ${#element_bg:=equalText(string(sameRow('spell1_damagetype')) ,'POI') ==
